title: march 24: dunder mifflin hits the airwaves
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the premiere of the US version of The Office, which ran for nine seasons on NBC and is considered one of the best TV shows of all time, launching the careers of Steve Carell, Mindy Kaling, Craig Robinson, and Ellie Kemper, to name a few. Afterwards, she talks about Passion Pit’s self-released album. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
